name: Pale Lands VR
description: Pale Lands VR brings you a lighthearted take on the zombie apocalypse! Play as YOU want by combining weapons and shifting strategies against progressive mobs of unique and absurd zombies. Defend the town and save humanity with a chicken leg!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
